attributes.action: Change the rules to a low money to be spent on alternative cures for Cancer.
attributes.additional_details: People who donate  to cancer research imagined they will investigate every  possible  cured.Not true.They give the lions  shared to their sister company  CRT Ltd who will only research patentable  drugs they can make more Millions from. My proposal is some money go to investigate the many alternative  cures from mother natures.Such as Cannabis oil legally given away free in Argentina.Thailand  a product  made from Mangosteen has been approved. would you like to change to this Insane situation
attributes.background: Cancer--we have all lost someone to Cancer and may be affected  by it ourselves in the future. cancer researches only ambition is that by 2034 3out 4 patients  will survive cancer.All this despite  being the richest charity in the world receiving just  short of 3 billion in the last 5 years.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
